TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the CustomizeMapAreas event of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class provides data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeMapAreas> event of the Chart control.
The only property of this class is the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>s property, which enables developers to:
- Delete or customize map areas that have been created for a chart object; any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object.
- Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreasCollection areaItems) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified map areas collection.
Gets or sets a object. Can be used to remove or modify map areas that correspond to a chart object, or to add custom map areas.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property allows you to:
- Delete or customize map areas that have been created for a chart object; any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object.
- Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates.
